name: Tampa Empire Computer Consulting
tag_list: managed-it-services, security-consulting, onsite-support, remote-support, virtual-assistant, remote-computer-repair, computer-repair-services, computer-repair-software, laptop-computer-repair, computer-repair, computer-repair-tampa
overview:
For maximum flexibility, speed, and efficiency, a robust IT strategy is critical. TECC IT Services offering helps consumers & companies make the most of their IT investments.

When your Small Business has computer and network problems, you have downtime and productivity loss, your customer service suffers, you lose critical data and your profits go down. This is a huge risk for any business. TECC provides proactive IT support to eliminate these risks and helps keep your productivity, service levels and profits growing.

For many small to medium-sized businesses, full-time IT staffing is impractical, but so is going without the critical IT service and support your business demands. Small organizations have a tendency to operate off the cuff, looking for freebies or grabbing cheap services not really designed for business. If you want to grow your business, approach your needs for computer support services like a bigger organization would.

We provide high-end services for small businesses at affordable prices. Every business and SoHo, regardless of the size, is now able to outsource their IT needs, thus, freeing them up to take care of other aspects of their business. Our unique support system includes a low-overhead but tightly connected infrastructure and sophisticated remote troubleshooting technology that maximizes responsiveness. We can remotely monitor your computers and servers from our command center and provide fast response to keep your systems running properly. By partnering with a provider of information technology services like us, youâ€™ll find a more thought out, comprehensive approach to small business IT solutions that can increase efficiency, save you money, generate revenue, and help your business succeed.

Servers and Networks Whether you need a home office wired or wireless network or a complete business operations network, we can provide a professional design and installation with local support. Our network services include servers, clients, routers, backup, security and cabling for small to medium size business networks. Our technicians are proficient in Linux, several flavors of UNIX and all versions of Windows.

Automated Backup Solutions We can provide economical automatic off-site backup of your critical data.

Consider this report from the University of Texas Center for Research on Information Systems. Of the companies that lose their data in a disaster: 90% are out of business within two yearsâ€¦ Nearly 50% never reopen their doors at all after the disaster!

With the annual threat of hurricanes and floods in Florida, it is all the more important for every business to have critical data backed up and ready to restore after an emergency.

Did you know that the average life of a hard drive is 3-4 years? Did you know that hard drive failure is common in 1-2 years? Did you know that the number one cause of catastrophic data loss is hard drive failure?

Point-of-Sale Systems We provide full-featured Retail and Restaurant Point-of-Sale systems with touch-screen, bar-coding, inventory tracking, employee scheduling and much more. Sytems ranging from a single station to a large retail store. â€œTurn-Keyâ€ hardware, software, installation, cabling and configuration is available.

Web Design Are you lost when it comes to a web presence for your small business? Our focus is small business and organizations. We can guide you through the process. We are committed to be a web designer you can trust and who will do the job right at prices that make sense.

Stop Spam from Getting Into Your Inbox Is spam driving you crazy? Junk email is a major worldwide problem. Unwanted email or spam now forms around 90% of received email!

You can now have the easiest and most powerful way to stop unwanted email from getting to your computer. Forget about other ways to stop spam, we are going to show you the ONLY way to deal to senders of junk email so you receive only the email you want!

Computer Service in Your Home Our technicians can provide friendly and efficient computer repairs and upgrades in your home.

Desktop Computer Service in Our Store Bring your desktop computer into our store for a FREE diagnosis and reduced repair rates. You donâ€™t need to bring in any cables or your monitor â€“ just your tower. We provide free diagnosis and estimates for your needed repair or upgrade. We will always advise you if your computer is past its useful life and is not worth repairing. If you choose not to have any repair made, it costs you nothing.

Laptop Computer Service in Our Store Bring your laptop computer of any brand into our store for a low-cost diagnosis and reduced repair rates. We provide fast and economical repair any kind of problem you may be having with your laptop, notebook or netbook including lost display, no power, lost keys or bad keyboard, failed hard drive, bad touchpad, plus any other hardware or software issue you may be experiencing with your laptop.

Computers, Software and Accessories We supply custom-built computers of the highest quality. We build workstations, home computers, servers and gaming systems to your specifications. We are a Microsoft OEM Systems Builder and can supply any Microsoft Operating System or Application software. We are also very proficient with Linux and can install Linux on our new computers or on your existing computer.

Security We can set up security measures that keep the bad guys out of your network. We can help you determine the level of security needed for your business and continuously monitor your network for malware and security breaches.

Saas and CRM Solutions

Our solutions combine award-winning functionality, proven integration, point-and-click customization, global capabilities, and the best user experience and the result is CRM success.

Enterprise Class Office Communications and Email Email, Calendaring & Sharing for Your Business so that you and your employees can be â€œon the same pageâ€ when it comes to customer relationships, scheduling and planning. Shared contact lists & calenders, task/goals prioritizing, day planner and company instant messaging. Great for multi-department communications, off-site employees and customer relationships. You control all email addresses and access from a Master Dashboard. You have complete access to all company-owned communications and contact lists.
